mapper.select: SELECT MONTH(question_datetime) AS questionMonth, IFNULL(COUNT(*), 0) as COUNT FROM ( SELECT question_datetime from question_board WHERE YEAR(question_datetime) = YEAR(NOW()) )t GROUP BY questionMonth
SELECT feildId, COUNT(*) AS count FROM ( SELECT feild_id as feildId from question_board WHERE YEAR(question_datetime) = YEAR(NOW()) )t GROUP BY feildId
